front.title: IDsec: Virtual Identity on the Internet

abstract.t: IDsec is a mechanism that provides an identity for users on theInternet. Identity in IDsec means that a user is known by a certainprofile that contains precisely those attributes that the user wantsto reveal to the requester of his profile. Access to profileattributes is managed by the user himself. Certificates andpublic/private key mechanisms ensure that information is exchanged ina secure way only between parties that trust each other.
